description: This table stores the dictation radiologist & dictating date information for orders performed in radiology.

columns.name: ORDER_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for this table as determined by the number of dictating radiologists for an order.

columns.name: DICTATING_DT
columns.description: The date that the radiologist sent the dictation to the transcriptionist.

columns.name: DICTATED_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item captures the date and time in the Universal Time Coordinated (UTC) format that the provider listed in the Dictated Physicians (I ORD 52205) item dictated the study.
